Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Benefits of feedback by AI is that I can ask questions at any time, as compared to lecs/ tutors which I feel I should only ask the most relevant questions. The benefit of the teacher's feedback is that they are the one marking it so they know what they are looking for.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I mean social evaluation from a teacher is more impactful as compared from a computer.
